author: Simon Difford
description: "The vodka drink with a kick" is simply vodka and ginger beer with a squeeze of lime served over ice. This drink's all-important enlivening spice is provided by the ginger beer so pick your brand wisely.
name: Moscow Mule
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: POUR first 3 ingredients into copper mug/glass and stir
Two-thirds fill vessel with cubed ice
TOP with ginger beer and crown with crushed ice
